name: SandGlass - pdf ppt legal & patent etc. translator
description: SandGlass is a revolutionary app that specializes in document translation(pdf, ppt, excel, word, image)  SandGlass is an artificial neural network translator that instantly recognizes and translates texts in virtually any written format in its original layout and formatting.   SandGlass translator allows intuitive and seamless translation of files. Whether it is for business professionals, students, or travelers, Sandglass makes translation of foreign documents easy.   * It features a professional-grade legal translation tool for Chinese legal documents that has received rave reviews from Chinese lawyers   * With most translation software, translated files lose most of their formatting. With SandGlass, you can translate PDF files into the same format while retaining the original layout and formatting    Features:   1) Translate files retaining the original format and layout. Never waste time fixing jumbled formatting again!   2) Translate various file formats such as word, pdf, excel, ppt, and txt.  3) Translate photos, images, and screenshots.  Translations between the following languages are supported: Korean, Chinese (Simplified), English, Japanese, Chinese (Traditional), Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Finnish, Turkish, Hebrew, Polish, Dutch, Norwegian, Czech, etc.  Permissions Notice Camera: Sandglass may need to access.  Privacy Policy With Sandglass, your files and data will be encrypted and be transmitted through a secure channel.
